title: Episode #72: A Debate on the Future of the AUMF
itunes:title: Episode #72: A Debate on the Future of the AUMF
itunes:subtitle: Ben Wittes and Rosa Brooks discuss the future of the AUMF at a panel moderated by Greg McNeal at Pepperdine University School of Law.
description:
Ben Wittes and Rosa Brooks discuss the future of the AUMF at a panel moderated by Greg McNeal at Pepperdine University School of Law.
